name: D'Rando
description:
D'Rango - a game made for the GMTK2022 Game Jam in 48 hours

(I recommend playing in fullscreen on smaller screens)

It is a bit buggy at times, but I had fun making this.

It's made with use of HTML, CSS and JS (no canvas)

programing and idea - Mason McFly

sprites and art- DanRen81112
